name: AZAMAR: The Role Playing Game, a Cinema6 Experience
blurb: AZAMAR is an epic world that presents a unique experience. It uses the Cinema6 RPG Framework brought to you by Wicked North Games.

rewards.reward: All pledges submitted before February 28th will have their names listed in the book's acknowledgments as a benefactor, you will also receive access to review Pledger Only updates, and the ability to opt in or out at any time and change your pledge.  Pledge now to gain access!
You will receive a PDF copy of the promotional-review version of AZAMAR.
You will receive a PDF copy of the complete AZAMAR Player\u2019s Guide, two weeks before it officially releases.

At this pledge level, we will upgrade your PDF of the AZAMAR Player\u2019s Guide to a soft cover printed copy that will be sent directly to you. In addition, you will receive a PDF copy of the promotional-review and complete versions of the following products: Westward, Clandestine, Descension, and Starcross core game books, two weeks prior to release.  The current order of production is Westward, Clandestine, Starcross, Descension.
All of the above, plus a limited edition AZAMAR six-sided die (+1d6), for use as a Wild Die.
All of the above, plus a pad of 100 sheets of AZAMAR Character Records.

All of the above, plus we upgrade the soft cover print copy of the Azamar Player\u2019s Guide to a limited edition hard cover version. To those who have already pledged at the $30 level, upgrade your $30 pledge to $75 to receive the Hard Cover!

All of the above, plus upgrade the soft cover print copy of the Azamar Player\u2019s Guide to a limited edition hard cover version, signed by the Wicked North Games team.  We will also create, establish, and include a major Character and/or Demi-God designed to your specifications in the print release, as well as move your name from acknowledgments to producers in the AZAMAR Player\u2019s Guide.

All of the above, except we upgrade your major Character or Demi-God to an Elder God. Included is an entire Pantheon and the relationships defined with the other deities of AZAMAR. Additionally at this Reward Level, we will have our artist will draw an original portrayal of your character to be included in the print release, also an original will be signed and sent to you.

At this Reward level, you do not receive any of the other Rewards, however you receive a Lifetime Membership with Wicked North Games. A Lifetime Membership means you receive a soft cover print copy of everything we ever produce, (including a print copy of the Azamar Player\u2019s Guide). Our thanks, and you will be listed as a Producer in every Publication produced by Wicked North Games, forever, as well as on the Wicked North Games website(s).
